response.answer_text: Different companies have different salary structures. Hence the comparison has to be done in a similar manner which is apple to apple comparison of monetary vs perks for each company. Again some companies have structured their salaries in a manner that tax liability is lower while a similar salary may end up having higher tax liability On that note there are quite a few manufacturing companies whose salary structure is higher than service companies
